title: Ep. 335 - Our Post-Christian Society
description:
Islamic terrorists in Sri Lanka murder 290 Catholics on Easter Sunday, and around the world, churches have become the #1 target for attacks. So political and media elites who don’t want to admit that fact have made up a new term to describe them. Date: 04-22-2019
